nodes.text: max-W 100, nicknamed "Max, the Janitor Droid", was a scanning droid that worked in the Droidnostics Center at the Star Tours travel agency. Max was a hard-working droid, although he sometimes blew out some carbon dioxide to relax.
It formerly worked at Matsushita Electric before being transferred over to Star Tours. Its nickname, "PanaRobo," was a reminder of its former career.

The background for this droid comes from a "Spot the Droid" poster displayed at the Tokyo Disneyland Star Tours, which was translated at the EndorExpress.net fan site. Much of the same information can be found in the Complete Guide to Star Tours pamphlet.
